applicationCategory: Multiscale modeling with varying submodel fidelity

affiliation.name: Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering, Rice University, Houston, TX, USA
Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering, Rice University, Houston, TX, USA

description: The code determines whether a combination of lower-fidelity submodels yields a more efficient Monte Carlo (MC) estimate than using the Most Accurate But Expensive (MABE) model. Rather than leveraging multifidelity MC methods, our approach identifies whether submodels can be completely replaced by reduced-fidelity models without affecting the quality of outcomes.
name: IdentifyingEfficientSubmodelFidelityCombinations
